Name: Knightmare
About the game: Use a unique chess-based move set to travel through the Dream Realm and prevent a mysterious amulet from falling into the wrong hands. Knightmare is a mouse-controlled puzzle platformer by Hagertech Games. Explore 30 carefully crafted levels as a chess knight and save the Dream Realm from destruction. Features Slay various monsters. Each enemy has its own weaknesses. Experience the game in different modes. In addition to the normal way to play, there is an unlockable hard mode and speed run mode. Enjoy 10+ original soundtracks. Atmospheric music that adds to the experience. Save the Dream Realm from destruction. Stop The Bishop before it's too late.
